tool_description: Analyzes customer purchase patterns, frequency, timing, and preferences to inform personalized pricing strategies.

customer_ids.description: Customer IDs to analyze purchase history for

analysis_start_date.description: Start date for purchase history analysis

analysis_end_date.description: End date for purchase history analysis

include_seasonal_patterns.description: Whether to identify seasonal buying patterns

error_messages: Invalid date range: analysis_end_date must be after analysis_start_date.
Empty customer list: Provide at least one customer ID to analyze.
Date range too short: Minimum analysis period is 30 days for meaningful insights.
Date range too long: Maximum analysis period is 3 years.
Invalid product categories: Ensure product_categories contains valid category names.
usage: Provide customer_ids, analysis_start_date, and analysis_end_date. Optionally filter by product_categories and enable seasonal pattern detection. Returns detailed purchase behavior insights.

price_sensitivity_indicators.description: Indicators of customer price sensitivity levels
